source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.
source_objects.title: Project Management

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Leading an Agile Team
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program - Course 6 of 8 - Leading an Agile Team
objectives_summary: Understand how the role of project manager differs between traditional and agile project management
Recognize practices that reflect the mindset of an agile project leader and the characteristics of an Agile team
Identify causes of problems on agile teams and understand strategies for overcoming agile team challenges

items.title: Project Management Course: Master Project Scope Management
items.headline: Practical guide to scope development and management - Project Management Certification (PMP, CAPM) Training [Earn 11PDU]
objectives_summary: How to distinguish yourself as a project manager.
A detailed and in depth understanding of all aspects pertaining to effective scope development and control.
How to effectively and correctly collect requirements.

items.title: Project Management Professional (PMP®) Exam Preparation
items.headline: Based on PMBOK Guide® Version 6
objectives_summary: 93 lectures and over 13 hours of videos.
Covers in detail all 10 Knowledge Areas and 5 Process Groups of PMBOK version 6.
Focuses on the areas you need to know to pass the exam.

items.title: AGILE: What Is "Real" Agile? Part 1: Understand "Real" Agile
items.headline: AGILE: Begin Your Journey To Understanding What Agile Really Is!
objectives_summary: The beginnings of the foundation for agile software development.
What Agile Is Not.
What does the Global job/career market look like.

items.title: AMAZING Project Management

visible_instructors.job_title: Author and Trainer: PRINCE2, MSP, APM & Change Management
visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.title: Susan Tuttle

items.headline: Launch your career in Project Management with the understanding and tools ready to use
objectives_summary: Understand projects, the project life cycle, the natural phases projects go through and how to concentrate your time and energy in each phase.
Recognise the how project management fits into the overall change context.
Learn how to manage projects effectively using good practice techniques and processes.

items.title: Cost Estimation - Basic course
items.headline: Construction Projects - Breakdowon and Analyze construction items for Cost estimation
objectives_summary: 1- Select the appropriate cost estimation methodology.
2- Prepare and collect data required for cost estimating any item.
3- Use the best cost estimation form.

items.title: PgMP question bank. 2 real-exam tests

visible_instructors.job_title: Leading the way to successful PgMP and PfMP certifications
visible_instructors.name: PgM
visible_instructors.title: PgM Certy

items.headline: Pass your PgMP exam with PgMCerty
objectives_summary: Practice on two real-life tests that are at exam level
Be able to validate your preparations
Benefit from the best content and rationales covering all concepts

items.title: PgMP Application Development

visible_instructors.job_title: Leading the way to successful PgMP and PfMP certifications
visible_instructors.name: PgM
visible_instructors.title: PgM Certy

items.headline: Pass your PgMP application panel review with PgMCerty (does not include review)
objectives_summary: Understand the details and rules of the PgMP application
Learn how to fill the PgMP application
Know what panel reviewers are looking for

items.title: Project Management : the Fundamentals
items.headline: Master the basics of project management. Discover the steps to manage your projects effectively.
objectives_summary: Master the basics of project management
Discover the qualities of a successful project manager
Manage complex projects with confidence

items.title: PMP® Exam Simulation (1)

visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Consultant in Project Management & PMO
visible_instructors.name: Lislal
visible_instructors.title: Lislal Viswam

items.headline: Based on New Exam (2021)- Most Frequently Asked Questions
objectives_summary: This course is made very precisely for passing PMP exam with above target.

items.title: Scrum Master Certification Test Simulator
items.headline: 240 questions arranged in 3 realistic tests that will help you prepare for the real Scrum certification
objectives_summary: Valuable experience of the Scrum Master test simulation (80 questions, 60 minutes limit, 85%  pass treshold).
Good understanding of the Scrum Guide and its content
Find out if you're ready to take the real exam.

items.title: Construction Claims Management - (9 PDUs)
items.headline: Construction Claims Management ... Step-by-step from Definition to Submital.
objectives_summary: Definition of Claim
Types of Claims
Introduction and brief history of FIDIC Contract Forms - FIDIC 2017

items.title: How to Calculate Earned Value for Your Project the Easy Way
items.headline: Successful Project Managers Report Project Performance Using Earned Value Management. This Course Will Teach You How!
objectives_summary: Apply earned value management process and report the real health of your projects
Identify projects at risk of going off-track in good time for corrective actions to be implemented
Astound your project steering team with detailed analysis of the performance of your projects

items.title: Project Risk Management
items.headline: Practice of identifying , analyzing, prioritizing  and mitigating risks
objectives_summary: Gain knowledge an techniques to apply project risk management

items.title: Gain a Working Knowledge of Project Cost Management
items.headline: BSBPMG412 - Apply project cost management techniques
objectives_summary: Understand the application of cost management in a project environment

items.title: Asana: Project Management on Asana
items.headline: Everything you need to Master Asana Project Management Software
objectives_summary: Using Asana to create and manage teams and projects
Independently manage your projects with no project management experience
Integrate Asana with other systems
